summary: UtilityCodeBase handles reading files that contain multiple utility code sections, parses special delimiters to separate prototypes, initialization code, and definitions, interprets metadata tags for required utilities and substitution strategies, supports optional Cython name mangling, and offers helpers for loading, caching, formatting and representing the code hierarchy.
business_intent: Provide a reusable infrastructure for dynamically loading, composing, and managing modular utility code fragments with dependency and substitution handling, facilitating code generation or pluginâ€‘style extensions.
